title: Infrastructure Alarms and Notifications for Compliance
desc: Configured various alarms and notifications to help the company meet SOC 2 and ISO 27001 certifications requirements.

title: CDK to Create Cloudsaver Environment
desc: Developed process to create environment using CDK to bypass Cloudformation regiona limitation.

title: Bicep to Create Environment in Azure
desc: Enabled creation of Cloudsaver environment in Azure using Bicep.

title: Automate Ticket Creation
desc: Automatically created tickets when there's vulnerability detected, unhealthy cloud resources or security event.

title: Build CI/CD Pipelines in Azure DevOps
desc: Created CI/CD pipelines such as .NET, Nuget, Python, Node.js, EF schema migration.

title: Pseudo Blue/Green Deployment for API pods in Kubernetes
desc: Released new features safely in Kubernetes.

title: Setup Datadog Tracing and Logging for EKS Fargate
desc: Setup monitoring APM and Logging for Datadog.

title: Implement Opensearch Snapshot Lifecycle Management
desc: Automatically create backup for disaster recovery.

title: Prevent Accidental Pull Request Merge from Unauthorized Branch
desc: Automatically check if pull request is from authorized source.

title: Automatically Moved Work Item in Azure DevOps
desc: Automated ticket movement after pull request is completed.

title: Dynamic Workers Deployments per Kafka Topic
desc: Configure setup to assign group of pods to a topic without any manual configuration change.

title: Automatically Run CSX Script and Perform Version Control Process
desc: Removed the load from developer to periodically run CSX script.

title: Get Memory Dump from .NET Application and Upload to S3
desc: Developed a script to automatically get memory dump and upload to S3.
